short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web Design Disruptor will visually disrupt an HTML page by randomly applying css animations to all HTML elements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will visually disrupt the design of a website.  Each time the webpage is loaded, a new random order of animations is applied to each HTML element and plays on loop.  This is just for fun!
